alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 11:59AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Portage, southern Trumbull and northern Mahoning Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1159 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ravenna to near Alliance to near Hartville. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Leavittsburg, Austintown, Struthers, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Atwater and Edinburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
